body.p: Whereas Cassaigne Francoi has been indicted and fined $6000 & costs in the Jefferson Circuit Court for retailing, spirituous liquors, without license,

We are informed that it is his first offence and that he has made a solemn promis never to be guilty of the like offence again, as he is represented to us as a law abiding citizen, and not able to pay the fine, We do therefore, Most earnestly recommend him to ^your^ Excellancy as a proper subject for Executive clemancy.

Robt L. Evans
L. A. Whiteley
Oliver Lucas.
Geo. W. Briggs
John D Pope
John C. Nants
O, T, Monsanat
